thread.title: Austin Rehkow makes 4 field goals; Idaho beats Troy 19-16
thread.title_full: Austin Rehkow makes 4 field goals; Idaho beats Troy 19-16

title: Austin Rehkow makes 4 field goals; Idaho beats Troy 19-16
text:
Austin Rehkow makes 4 field goals; Idaho beats Troy 19-16 By   
TROY, Ala. (AP) - Austin Rehkowmade four field goals and Idaho held on to beat Troy 19-16 on Saturday. 
Rehkow converted from the 34, 31, 40, and 19. Jake Luton ran for a 4-yard touchdown, and Dezmon Epps had 10 catches for 131 yards to lead Idaho (2-4, 1-2 Sun Belt Conference). 
Jed Solomon, who made three field goals, missed a 32-yard field goal attempt with 32 seconds left to seal it for Idaho. 
Rehkow’s fourth field goal gave the Vandals a 19-16 lead with three minutes left. On the ensuing series, Dallas Tidwell completed four passes, including a 7-yarder on fourth-and-2, to lead the Trojans on a 60-yard drive before Solomon’s field goal attempt hit the right post. 
Idaho led 16-3 late in the third quarter when Tidwell came off the bench and led Troy (1-5, 0-2) on three consecutive scoring drives, including a 43-yard touchdown pass to Teddy Ruben.
